评论概述: True to Size and Well Made
评论详情: I recently purchased an oversized sweatshirt that instantly transported me back to my childhood—specifically, to my favorite show, Rugrats. From the moment I slipped it on, I felt a wave of nostalgia wash over me, and I couldn't have been happier with my choice!  First and foremost, the fit is fantastic. The sweatshirt is true to size, offering that perfect oversized look without being overly baggy. It's incredibly comfortable, making it an ideal choice for lounging around the house or running errands. The bold colors are another highlight; they pop vibrantly and definitely stand out in a crowd. I’ve received so many compliments from friends and even strangers—everyone seems to appreciate the nostalgic vibe!  One of my main concerns when purchasing clothing online is how well it will hold up after washing. I'm pleased to report that this sweatshirt washes beautifully! I followed the care instructions, and it came out just as vibrant and cozy as when I first got it. No fading or pilling, which is always a bonus.  The quality of the material is also worth noting. It feels well-made and durable, giving me confidence that it will last through many washes and wears. It's clear that a lot of thought went into the design and craftsmanship.  Overall, this sweatshirt has exceeded my expectations. It’s the perfect blend of comfort, style, and nostalgia, and I can’t recommend it enough to fellow fans of Rugrats or anyone looking for a fun, oversized addition to their wardrobe. Whether you're a child of the '90s or just someone who appreciates great graphic apparel, this sweatshirt is a must-have!

This sweatshirt is wonderful!!  sweatshirt feel, but still light weight.  For someone who lives in sweatshirts and leggings and easily overheats with toddlers climbing all over her, this sweatshirt is perfection.  It's really true to size, is a good fit and feeling and still breathable.  Planning to purchase another... just because!
Very comfortable sweatshirt. I get a lot of comments when I wear this.
I now own 4 of these things. They are so cute. Good quality fabric and nice oversized sweatshirt look. I’m 177 lbs and 5’6. I took an XL.

I've seen these shirts everywhere, and decided to try one myself. I got the grey and black striped one in an XL. I love it, the fit is cute and flattering, without making me look frumpy (which is my biggest problem with clothing). The sleeves are long and baggy, but the bottom of the shirt fits well around my waist. I will definitely buy more colors of this shirt!
